/* Move TOC */
@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
  #TOC {
    left: 10px !important;
    width: 220px;
  }
}

/* Force justify text inside the main content */
body, .container, .content {
  text-align: justify !important;
}

/* Also justify text inside all paragraphs */
body p, .container p, .content p {
  text-align: justify !important;
}
